00014 // Simulated address types
00015 
00016 #ifndef SIMADDRTYPES_H
00017 #define SIMADDRTYPES_H
00018 
00019 #include "hostapi/impTypes.h"
00020 
00021 #define MIN_ADDR          ((Addr)0)
00022 #define MAX_ADDR          (MIN_ADDR-1)
00023 #define MAX_ADDR_BITS(_B) ((_B)==ADDRESS_SIZE?MAX_ADDR:((((Addr)1)<<(_B))-1))
00024 #define BITS_TO_BYTES(_B) (((_B)+7)/8)
00025 #define BITS_TO_WORDS(_B) (((_B)+31)/32)
00026 
00027 typedef union {Addr a; Uns32 u32[sizeof(Addr)/sizeof(Uns32)];} AddrToUns32;
00028 typedef union {Addr a; UnsPS ups[sizeof(Addr)/sizeof(UnsPS)];} AddrToUnsPS;
00029 
00030 #endif
